title: T206 FS all SGC or PSA Some Old Mill & Polar Bear
author: botport

posts.post_title: T206 FS all SGC or PSA Some Old Mill & Polar Bear
posts.post_content:
Ferguson   SGC 40 PM 350 $40
Ritchey    SGC 40 SC 350 $40
Hunter      SGC 40 SC 350 $40 SOLD
Unglaub    SGC 40 PM 350 $40 SOLD
Summers  PSA 2 PM 350 $30
Conroy (Fielding)PSA 3 SC 150 $40 SOLD
Doolan PSA 2 OM $37
Hallman PSA 3 PB $42


Add $3 S/H
Check or Money Order only Please

Cards arrived today - I was a little worried it would take forever since i had to send a check, but I worried for nothing. Thanks for the great transaction.

Also, I had to crack the PSA case - nothing against PSA, but the SGC holders are so much nicer to look at. And it would be the only non-SGC T206 in my collection. Do people notify PSA that the card's not in the case anymore? Or do they frown on that?
